verses.kjv: The LORD reigneth; let the earth rejoice; let the multitude of isles be glad thereof.
verses.ct: The LORD rules! Let the earth celebrate; let the distant coastlands be filled with joy.

verses.kjv: Clouds and darkness are round about him: righteousness and judgment are the habitation of his throne.
verses.ct: Clouds and deep darkness surround him; righteousness and justice are the foundation of his throne.

verses.kjv: A fire goeth before him, and burneth up his enemies round about.
verses.ct: Fire goes ahead of him, consuming his enemies on every side.

verses.kjv: His lightnings enlightened the world: the earth saw, and trembled.
verses.ct: His lightning lit up the world; the earth witnessed it and shook.

verses.kjv: The hills melted like wax at the presence of the LORD, at the presence of the Lord of the whole earth.
verses.ct: The mountains melted like wax in the presence of the LORD, in the presence of the Lord of all the earth.

verses.kjv: The heavens declare his righteousness, and all the people see his glory.
verses.ct: The heavens proclaim his righteousness, and every nation witnesses his glory.

verses.kjv: Confounded be all they that serve graven images, that boast themselves of idols: worship him, all ye gods.
verses.ct: Everyone who worships carved images will be put to shame â€” those who brag about their idols. Every god must bow down before him.

verses.kjv: Zion heard, and was glad; and the daughters of Judah rejoiced because of thy judgments, O LORD.
verses.ct: Zion heard this and was overjoyed; the towns of Judah celebrated because of your judgments, LORD.

verses.kjv: For thou, LORD, art high above all the earth: thou art exalted far above all gods.
verses.ct: Because you, LORD, are supreme over all the earth; you are raised far above every other god.

verses.kjv: Ye that love the LORD, hate evil: he preserveth the souls of his saints; he delivereth them out of the hand of the wicked.
verses.ct: You who love the LORD, despise evil. He protects the souls of those devoted to him; he rescues them from the grip of the wicked.

verses.kjv: Light is sown for the righteous, and gladness for the upright in heart.
verses.ct: Light is planted like seed for the righteous, and joy for those whose hearts are honest.

verses.kjv: Rejoice in the LORD, ye righteous; and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.
verses.ct: Celebrate in the LORD, you who are righteous, and give thanks as you remember his holiness.
